about_the_game:
Dive into the neon-drenched underbelly of a cyberpunk metropolis in DeadWire—where every enemy is an opportunity and every object is a weapon.

As a skilled hacker with a debt to settle, you're on a mission to dismantle powerful criminal organizations threatening the only home you've ever known—the orphanage that raised you. Armed with cutting-edge weapons and your unique Rewire Mode, you have the power to turn the tide in this fast-paced top-down shooter.

Add DeadWire to your wishlist to stay updated on the release (and support a solo developer in the process<3).

Rewire the Battlefield

Harness the power of your Rewire Mode to hack and link enemies, vehicles, and environmental objects, creating devastating chain reactions:

  • Chain Reactions: Link a guard to a nearby car—eliminate the guard, and watch the car roar to life, plowing through enemies.

  • Environmental Hacks: Turn arcade machines, ATM's and laser traps against their owners.

  • Strategic Gameplay: Use the environment to outsmart and outmaneuver overwhelming odds.

Features

  • Dynamic Hacking System: Turn the environment into your weapon by hacking and linking objects and enemies.

  • High-Octane Combat: Engage in fast-paced, satisfying gunplay with guns, swords and other powerful skills.

  • Atmospheric Cyberpunk Setting: Immerse yourself in a neon-soaked world, bright lights can't hide the dirt.

  • Epic Synthwave Soundtrack: Your ears will love the soundtrack.

  • Challenging Missions: Complete side objectives and time trials for extra rewards and replayability.

Inspired by classics like Hotline Miami, DeadWire delivers intense, fast-paced action fused with innovative hacking mechanics. Experience a new level of chaos and player choice.

Feel free to join the Discord if you want updates and betas!
